titleStmt.title: The state martyrologie. Or, innocent blood speaking its mournfull tragedy, in the history of the late anarchy since 1648. to this present time 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Creake and are to be sold by Edw. Thomas at the Adam and Eve in Little-brittaine,

notesStmt.note: With engraved portraits of Charles II; the Marquis of Montrose; Lord Capell; the Earl of Derby; and Doctor Hewitt
A summary of the events of 1648 [i.e., 1649] - 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
